notes: The ReStore accepts home improvement items that are in good repair. Accepted items are furniture, appliances that are in working order, cabinetry, building materials, tools and anything else that is in the home improvement category that is able to be re-sold. We do not accept clothing, dishes, knick-knacks or soft goods (such as linens and draperies). We cannot accept used mattresses.
